com.viaoa.util
Class OATime

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.util.OADateTime
      com.viaoa.util.OATime
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable
public class OATime
extends OADateTime

Time class that combines Calendar, Time and SimpleDateFormat into a single class.

OATime is not affected by timezone. A time created on one system will be the same on another machine, even if the timezone is different. See OADateTime for list or formatting symbols.

See Also:
OADateTime, Serialized Form

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Converts this time to a String value using default format. The default format is the first format that has been set: "format", "timeOutputFormat" else or "hh:mma" See OADateTime for list of formatting symbols.

timeValue

public static OATime timeValue(java.lang.String time)
Converts a String to an OATime using a default format. The default format is the first format that has been set: "format", "timeOutputFormat" else or "hh:mma" See OADateTime for list of formatting symbols.

See Also:
valueOf(String,String), OADateTime

valueOf

public static OADateTime valueOf(java.lang.String time,
                                 java.lang.String fmt)
Converts a String to an OATime. See OADateTime for list of formatting symbols. If time can not be parsed based on supplied format, then other formatting and conversions will be used to try to convert to an OATime.

Note: you will need to cast the return value to a OATime.

Parameters:
fmt - is format to use for parsing. See OADateTime for list of formatting symbols.
See Also:
OADateTime, timeValue(String,String)

valueOf

public static OADateTime valueOf(java.lang.String time)
Converts a String to an OATime using a default format. The default format is the first format that has been set: "format", "timeOutputFormat" else or "hh:mma" See OADateTime for list of formatting symbols.

Note: you will need to cast the return value to a OATime.

See Also:
valueOf(String,String), OADateTime, timeValue(String,String)
